marytts.signalproc.analysis

Class CepstrumSpeechAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.analysis.CepstrumSpeechAnalyser

  • public class CepstrumSpeechAnalyser
extends Object
    Author:
    Marc Schröder, oytun.turk Computes real and complex cepstrum directly from speech spectrum Note that this is different than LP cepstrum which is implemented in CepstrumLPCAnalyser
